field.text: The study of cybernetics as they relate to the human body. People with this skill are knowledgeable about cybernetics, how they function, and how to design and modify or repair them. A person with this skill and the appropriate supplies can work on cyborgs.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to dance. Choose a particular type, such as Ballroom, Country and Western, Swing, etc.

field.name: Occupation
field.text: Con artist, thief, crooked businessman, stage magician

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to hide the truth about something, or make things appear different than they really are, by talking about them. This is NOT lying outright, etc, but cleverly presenting the evidence to further your goal. This is usually achieved by downplaying or carefully ignoring some information while strategically emphasizing other points. Bending the truth, rationalizing things, etc, falls under this skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: How to decorate that is pleasing to the eye.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to negotiate and broker deals for business, political, and legal purposes. A person with this skill will know how to make compromises that best suit his goals, and will be able to deal with people in tense situations without angering them.

field.name: Description
field.text: Characters with Disguise know how to make themselves look like someone else. Either to copy the looks of another person or to just change the appearance of the character. This also includes the ability to detect if someone else is in disguise.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowledge of drinks, how to make them, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: The academic skill of the design and function of electronics and electrical systems. A person with this skill would know how to design and analyze electronic devices.

field.name: Description
field.text: The practical knowledge of the electrical wiring of homes and buildings. A person with this skill will know about the electrical wiring in buildings, and how to repair and modify such things. This includes the use of related tools, and how to identify problems and parts.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of electronic technology such as communications jamming, stealth technology, ECM, ECCM, and related topics as applied to electronics in war or combat situations.

field.name: Description
field.text: The practical skill of building, troubleshooting, and repairing electronic devices. A person with this skill would have only basic knowledge of designing electronic devices, but they are skilled in repairing, modifying, and working on electronic items. This includes use of electronic tools such as test equipment, soldering gear, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: The skill of entertaining people by telling jokes, simple performances, and improvising. Being comfortable and at ease around people.

field.name: Description
field.text: People with this skill have the ability to escape from bonds. This includes ropes, handcuffs, straight jackets, and similar restrictive bonds.

field.name: Occupation
field.text: Military specialist, thief, detective, private investigator

field.name: Description
field.text: The skills required to find out information by observing others and their actions. Includes techniques for watching people and listening in on their conversations, etc, from a distance. Also, how to set up stakeouts and use technology (cameras, bugs, etc) to perform these tasks falls under the scope of this skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: The belief in a particular religion, God(s), or a spiritual philosophy. Note that this skill is true belief in that religion, not simply knowledge about it. This skill is use for Faith-type magic. See magic section for more details

field.name: Description
field.text: The character knows how to fall from a fall distance. When falling, the character can roll his skill. He can fall 10 feet per success without taking damage. Beyond that, he takes the normal 16 per 10 feet.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowledge growing crops, harvesting, etc. Includes knowledge of raising common farm animals and working with farm equipment.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowledge and selection of clothing and related items to maximize beauty, or to convey a particular image.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of how to make movies, commercials, and other video productions. Includes knowledge of directing, sets, working with actors, simple effects, and film editing.

field.name: Description
field.text: Basic first aid treatment for various common injuries. Includes knowledge of basic medication, bandaging, treatment of wounds, stabilizing victims, and performing very simple medical procedures in the field. A successful use of this skill will stop a person below 0 hit points from losing any more, this takes a turn to attempt.

field.name: Description
field.text: Deducing the nature of a crime or other event based on evidence, especially minimal evidence. Taking and matching fingerprints, analyzing handwriting, notes, threats, study of weapons or other objects used in crimes, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of how to forge signatures, documents, insignia, etc. and how to detect forged work.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of card and casino games, such as poker, blackjack, craps, baccarat, roulette, etc. This includes how to play the games, rules, the odds of winning, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: The academic study of the earth and its geological formationsincluding rocks, minerals, and related scientific elements. A person with this skill would know how to identify various geological features, including gems, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: The art of glass-blowing. How to make, shape, and judge glass. How to make objects, and sculptures; things like idols, plateware, jugs, abstract art, etc. The ability to be artistic is governed by this skill. If the character also has blacksmithing, carpentry, etc. they can make their own tools, and forge. The ability to design new types of glass requires alchemy or chemistry.

field.name: Description
field.text: The design and layout of printed matter, such as books, magazines, newspapers, and posters and advertising materials. Includes designing such works for maximum readability and visual impact, as well as the production of printed materials. This involves typesetting, production of master copies, operating a printing press, and desktop publishing on a computer.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to design, repair, modify, and build handguns, shotguns, and rifles. A person with this skill cannot build a gun from scratch, but can build guns from raw parts, and is skilled in the modification and tuning of firearms.

field.name: Description
field.text: The art of gaining access to computer systems and software by indirect means. This often includes breaking into secured systems or networks. Password cracking, enabling protected software, etc. falls under this skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: Historical knowledge extending from the present until 5000 years in the past. Persons with this skill will know about major political figures (and other famous people), wars, famines, natural disasters, and major culturalscientificreligious events and discoveries made during that time.

field.name: Description
field.text: Adds HitPoints to your character. You get two per CP spent.

field.name: Description
field.text: Non-traditional medicine, such as acupuncture, massage therapy, use of herbal drugs, etc. Choose a branch when selecting this skill (example

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to locate, stalk, and kill game. This includes looking for game animals and signs of their presence, tracking, and techniques for stalking them. Also, using weapons (such as bows, firearms, spears, etc.) and traps to kill game, and how to butcher game in the field for meat and skins.

field.name: Description
field.text: The skills of portraying a character or person other than oneself. Includes how to alter voice, habits and mannerismsas well as basic costuming, etc. in order to play the part. This skill is used for professional actors, and for espionage purposes.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to manipulate the emotions of others by interacting with them. Through verbal communication and body language, a person with this skill can cause others to become happy, sad, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Extracting information or answers to specific questions from someone through various means. This might include deceiving the target, befriending them, convincing them, intimidation/blackmail, or even torture.

field.name: Occupation
field.text: Law enforcement, soldier, almost any other occupation

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to guess well in situations where a person is unsure about two or more options. A person with this skill tends to guess correctly between options more than statistics would predict. This skill can only be used if the character had some knowledge in the general area of the guess to be made.

field.name: Description
field.text: Gathering information about something or someone using the media, interviewing people, looking at firsthand accounts and other evidence, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Researching recent events and reporting on them concisely. This skill is common for newspapers and TV news station crews.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of a language. Possessing this skill implies proficiency of one language. Purchase this skill separately for each language a person knows. Higher levels imply greater proficiency, eloquence, and superior vocabulary. Note that if you purchase Literacy and Language together (the same language) you may purchase Language as a LVL 1 skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to observe situations, prioritize activities related to them, and guide people through them. All characters under the leadership of someone with this skill may add X to each of their initiative numbers. (The person with the leadership skill may do this as well) X is the number of successes on the leadership roll.

field.name: Description
field.text: Working with leather and leather goods. This includes the tanning of leather, forming it into shapes (such as bags, pouches, saddles, clothing items, weapon sheaths, etc.), and sewing it into useable goods.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowledge of legal systems and how to use them.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to write and read a written language. Note that if you purchase Literacy and Language together (the same language) you may purchase Language as a LVL 1 skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of well-known literature (famous works and authors), as well as general rhetoric and literary expression. Note that this is not the same thing as language, literacy, or writing.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of locks, how to open them without a key, and how locks (both simple and complex) operate. This includes the use of lock-opening tools such as picks, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: The maximum value of the characters Luck subattribute is increased by one.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowing how to tell a lie is a fine art, and this character knows it. The character can tell a convincing lie and to develop plausible alibis. This also allows the character to detect that someone else is lying.

field.name: Description
field.text: The skills of metalworking. This includes how to operate common tools in a metalworking shop, as well as processes such as welding, flame cutting, etc. A person with this skill can read blueprints, and can produce parts and devices from metal given the proper equipment. This skill is also useful for repairing mechanical devices, such as vehicles, robots, and mecha.

field.name: Description
field.text: This skill represents a magic user's ability to accurately control magic energy and make it do what she wants it to. See magic section for full information.

field.name: Description
field.text: The academic study of magic and related processes. A character may also use this skill to identify magical items (requires touching them). It also allows a character to read magical script such as that used in spell books.

field.name: Description
field.text: How to add arbitrary mana points.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to manage people and resources in order to accomplish a certain task. This is primarily in business personnel, as well as military commanders, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowledge of piloting a ship or boat. The knowledge of maritime laws, practices, and the general maintenance and operation of boats and ships fall under the scope of this skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: (See Martial Arts section) This is the governing skill of the Martial Arts subsystem. It represents the level of skill that a person has in martial arts. No person may posses a martial arts technique of higher rank than his or her level of martial arts.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of various natural and processed substances and their uses and applications. This is a supporting skill for many engineering skills, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowledge of mathematical theory and techniques for apply mathematics to real life situations.

field.name: Description
field.text: The electronics skill as applied to Mecha. This includes the design and modification of the electrical systems of mechs, including computers, sensors, and related components.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to operate a Mech. This skill is required in order for a character to operate a Mech. While piloting a mech, any DEX-based skill you want to use cannot have a higher level than this skill. See Mecha rules for more information.

field.name: Description
field.text: The skills for performing maintenance, repair, and related work on cars, trucks, buses, and motorcycles. In short, just about any vehicle except aircraft and mecha.

field.name: Description
field.text: The academic study of mechanical parts and systems. This includes such things as machinery, controls, structural design, etc. A person with this skill would be adept at designing mechanical things, and analyzing the designs of others. This skill does NOT imply the ability to make a mechanical device.

field.name: Description
field.text: Professional medicine. The study of the human body, its ailments, and how to treat them. Lvl 1 = Pre-Med Student, Lvl 2 = Med School GraduateResident, Lvl 3 = Inexperienced MD. You may choose the area of expertise

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to fix wounds 'in the field'. This can be done as a standard action.

field.name: Description
field.text: The strategic deployment and command of troops, tanks, ships, and other units in war, police, security, and similar situations.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to correctly assess the ability to mine a large, long, deep tunnel. How to go about digging the tunnel, and all the logistics and equipment needed for the mine.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to play an instrument. Select what instrument when you pick this skill. This implies the ability to read music.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of the myths, superstitions, and religious beliefs of past civilizations. This can be generic overall knowledge, or specific and in-depth in one particular area.

field.name: Description
field.text: How to plot and plan directions and courses in natural settings.

field.name: Description
field.text: The dispensing, dosage calculation, and selection of drugs. How to make pills or liquid medicines (from the raw medicine), and the knowledge of what existing drugs work for what ailments; knowledge of combined effects from mixing drugs, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Study of any particular type of philosophy or outlook on life (or general knowledge of several). Academic skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: The skills associated with taking pictures. The selection and operation of cameras (still and video), use of lenses and filters, taking pictures in various different conditions, working with film, as well as developing and editing prints.

field.name: Description
field.text: The academic study of natural laws, including mechanics, electricity and magnetism, optics, etc. The study of how and why things act the way they do.

field.name: Description
field.text: The repair and installation of piping, drains, and fixtures (sinks, bathtubs, water heaters, etc.) in and around buildings. Includes working with piping, fittings, etc. for both water and gas use.

field.name: Description
field.text: Affinity for politics; knowledge of the political process, political groups and their agendaspublic and private. The knowledge of current political events, deal making, vote gathering, and lobbying fall under this scope of this skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: The academic study of Pisioncs; including how psionic powers work, what they do, and what their limitations are. This skill is NOT required to use psionic abilities.

field.name: Description
field.text: Riding an animal. Select the type of animal for the skill. Common examples are horses, camels, elephants, etc. This skill can be taken for any riding animal. The skill also includes basic care, grooming and feeding of the animal.

field.name: Description
field.text: The scientific knowledge and practical engineering experience associated with working on robots. Much like how a mechanic works on cars, a person with robotics is skilled at working on robots. This includes designing robots (greatly aided with mechanical and electrical engineering), and repairing or modifying them.

field.name: Description
field.text: Tying knots, working with ropes and cables for purposes of lifting and securing loads, etc. Sailors, dockworkers, crane crews, truckers, climbers, etc commonly possess this skill. Persons with this skill know what knots to use when and how to tie them. Also gives the character the knowledge on the suitability of ropes and cables for different applications.

field.name: Description
field.text: The academic study of rune magic. No character may learn a rune spell of higher rank than his level of this skill. (See Rune Magic system...)

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of how to use assist equipment for underwater diving. This includes SCUBA systems, air tanks, surface compressors, diving suits, and related devices. Persons with this skill will know how to avoid decompression sickness, how to communicate underwater by means of signals, and how to recover small to mid-sized objects underwater.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowledge of sailboats and how to sail them. This includes setting up and working with sails and rigging, steering, etc. A person with this skill will have basic navigation knowledge, and knowledge of maritime laws.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to sell something. A person with this skill will be adept at marketing and promotion of goods and services, finding buyers, negotiating prices, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowledge of how and where to look for items, but not from 'normal' sources. People with this skill are known for their ability to find just about anythingeven if that means digging around in dumpsters, pawnshops, and similar locations.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of how to protect persons, objects, and places. This includes use of security systems, surveillance equipment, and guard personnel. A person with this skill knows how to use these measures to protect things, and also recognizes their weaknesses, as well as common tactics used to breach them.

field.name: Description
field.text: The use of oneself to make other people to do what they want. This might include faking friendship or romantic interest, deceptive speech, and use of physical attractiveness.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to sing. This can be any type of music. This skill implies the ability to read music.

field.name: Description
field.text: This skill includes things such as stage magic, palming things, concealment, etc. A person with this skill can perform various card tricks, other magic tricks, and would be skilled at palming objects, or making objects 'appear' from thin air. This could be used for tricks, stealing small objects, or concealing small weapons.

field.name: Description
field.text: The art of working with metal with primitive techniques. Persons with this skill are experienced at forming metal with a forge, hammer, and anvil. This skill can be used to make simple tools, weapons, and other goods.

field.name: Description
field.text: The skill of casting magical spells, invocation style. You cannot purchase a spell whose rank is higher than your level of this skill. It provides additional MP as well. See magic section for full information.

field.name: Description
field.text: Stealth gives the character the ability to move silently through his or her surroundings.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of how the streets 'work'; things like cants, where to find contacts, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: A variant of magic applied to calling forth animals and various creatures to assist the caster. See the Summoning Magic text for more information.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of little known or unusual mythology, especially that involving ghosts, monsters, undead, werewolves or vampires, etc. A person with this skill will have knowledge of various mythical (and real) beasts, monsters, etc. including their appearance, strengthsweaknesses, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to find food, water, and shelter in most any situation. Includes making simple shelters (lean-tos, tents, stick houses, etc.), making a fire, collecting food and water, and avoiding harm from the elements (extreme temperatures), dangerous animals, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Similar to Athletics, but specifically swimming and diving skills. Imparts the endurance and techniques to swim long distances, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to teach skills you know to others.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of religion and how to argue about religion. Non-historical in nature.

field.name: Description
field.text: Throwing things with accuracy and power. This could be a rock, baseball, grenade, or whatever. A person with this skill can throw things much more accurately and further than a normal person. (Note, this skill can be used in combat to strike with grenades or similar thrown weapons. However, throwing knives, shuriken, etc. are a different skill)

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to follow something (animal, person, or vehicle) based on the signs it left behind. This includes such things as identifying and following tracks, finding hidden or covered tracks, and how to disguise tracks.

field.name: Description
field.text: The knowledge of unusual or generally useless facts like obscure history, sports stats, info about actors and actresses, etc. This is the kind of knowledge one would need to do well at trivia games, like Trivial Pursuit and Jeopardy.

field.name: Occupation
field.text: Truck driver, construction worker, some soldiers

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to drive land-based vehicles other than automobiles or motorcycles. This would apply to things like heavy trucks, buses, tanks, construction equipment, forklifts, and other things.

field.name: Description
field.text: The medicine skill applied to animals. See Medicine skill for more detail.

field.name: Description
field.text: Knowledge of weapons design, suitability of weapons, and how to make weapons. In an archaic setting, this would include how to make simple weapons. In a modern setting, one could design weapons, but might not be able to build them (that might require such skills as mechanical or electrical engineering, machining, etc.)

field.name: Description
field.text: This is effectively a specialization of the skill

field.name: Description
field.text: Special skill. This can be thought of as a resume or work experience. It implies that you have work experience and higher levels mean you are a desirable employee. Talk to your GM about what this skill does for you.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to write convincing literary works. This could be poetry or prose, fiction or nonfiction. (This is NOT the skill of being literate. This is the skill of being a good writer).

field.name: Description
field.text: Imparts the ability to control one's body movements effectively in low-G or zero-G environments such as in space, freefall, or underwater.

field.name: Description
field.text: The academic study of animals; including their biology and their behavior, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: One or more metal blades is inserted into the forearm. It can extend forward or swing out from the back of the arm. The blades are used with the small sword skill and can deal 16+2S

field.name: Description
field.text: Special armor plating is inserted into the back of the forearm. This makes the forearm and effective tool for parrying melee attacks. Armor is 5/9/5

field.name: Description
field.text: A special set of hands designed to improve your ability to climb. -1 DEX for normal tasks. +4 to climbing rolls. When combined with Climbing Feet, bonus is a total of +6

field.name: Description
field.text: A semiautomatic gun, in any normal pistol caliber, can be concealed in the forearm

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to extend your arms up to twice their normal length. You have -3 STR with the arms fully extended. They can be extended and contracted at wll.

field.name: Description
field.text: This device, when implanted into a hand, can be used to spray chemicals a short distance away. It can't store very much liquid, however.

field.name: Description
field.text: This allows the user to lock his grip on an object. When locked, it requires 5 greater than the user's STR to un-break the grip. It also gives +5 to STR checks for holding onto an object.

field.name: Description
field.text: This modification gives your hands -1 DEX, but allows you to heat your palms to a significant temperatures. This can be used to deal 14U damage in an attack, or for cooking food, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Gives 2 slots in either arm. 1 in upper arm, one in lower arm.

field.name: Description
field.text: An armored palm can be used as a shield to block attacks, etc. The palm has 6/8/4 armor after this modification.

field.name: Description
field.text: A luminescent watch is implanted beneath the skin somewhere on the body. It is usually in the wrist area. It tells perfect time, and you can't ever loose it!

field.name: Description
field.text: Small tools, similar to a swiss army knife, are implanted into the hands. They aren't strong enough for tough jobs, but are very handy for light work. Includes a small knife, scissors, file, saw, various screwdrivers, bottle/can opener, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Robotic fingers can split apart into six individual micro-fingers. This allows one to type on a keyboard much faster than with normal hands. When in typing mode, hand has a STR of 2.

field.name: Description
field.text: A modification to your joints. It enables a given joint to move in a manner in which it normally couldn't. (so, you could bend your knee backwards, for example)

field.name: Description
field.text: Adds another orificice to the body (or adapts an existing one), enabling you to eat from it. Thus, it's possible to eat through your ear, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Improves your ability to survive and perform in odd enviornments, such as deserts, snow, high altitude, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: A minor cosmetic modification to the body, such as skin ridges, changing the shape of part of the body, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Makes your skin glow. You can turn it on and off at will

field.name: Description
field.text: Enables a certain joint in the body (knee, wrist, elbow, etc.) to be detached and re-connected at will. This enables you to switch limbs or attachments on your body.

field.name: Description
field.text: Change the color of your skin. It can be changed to any color, or patterns, etc. Changing takes a few seconds.

field.name: Description
field.text: Makes healing your body and working on your cybernetics unusually easy. Downtime is reduced by half.

field.name: Description
field.text: Protects the body from electrical damage. Take only 50damage from electrical attacks unless they originate from inside the body.

field.name: Description
field.text: Make yourself bleed at will, for no reason, and without harm. You can stop the false bleeding at will.

field.name: Description
field.text: Prevents the skin from burning in normal situations. You take half damage from short-term contact with fire.

field.name: Description
field.text: Enables you to create water naturally. Usually installed on the neck, but could be anywhere. The Gills are a sensitive organ.

field.name: Description
field.text: Enables you to control the look of your hair at will. This can do anything that normal hair styling can do, and affects the entire body

field.name: Description
field.text: Hardens the skin all over your body. 3/0/0

field.name: Description
field.text: Upgrade the STR of your muscles. Can be purchased as many times as you want. Each purchase is +1 STR

field.name: Description
field.text: Increases the amount of fast-twitch muscle fiber in your body. Gain +3 STR for fast applications, but suffer a -1 BLD. You also suffer and -3 STR for anything that takes longer than a second. -2 Enc

field.name: Description
field.text: Improves the sensitivity of your skin. You can accuratley determine the shape, size, texture, and temperature of objects touching you.

field.name: Description
field.text: Adds speed to your wings. Each purchase is +20 MPH

field.name: Description
field.text: Change the color of your skin. It works fairly slowly, and can only be used to match normal human colorskin. It can be white, black, yellow. You can simulate tans, etc, but cannot do unnatural colors.

field.name: Description
field.text: Replace your muscles with superior lab-grown ones. +1 STR and +1 BLD

field.name: Description
field.text: Muscle enhancement which improves motor control. Each purchase adds +1 DEX. Can be purchased more than once, but each consecutive purchase is twice the cost of the previous one.

field.name: Description
field.text: Replaces your nervous system (except the brain) with an electronic network.

field.name: Description
field.text: Enables you to shut off or dimininsh pain at your will

field.name: Description
field.text: Protects the body from radiation from outside sources. Will not protect you from ingesting radioactive materials, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Toughens your skeleton and improves how smoothly it moves, improving your BLD by 1 point

field.name: Description
field.text: A replacement for your normal skeleton. The bones are make of many individual joints, and can be bent at will. This enables you to perform amazing feats of contortion. +1 DEX -1 STR

field.name: Description
field.text: A replacement for your normal skeleton. It has the ability to be locked rigid, giving you a +3 to STR contests, and an additional +1 BLD

field.name: Description
field.text: Your blood vessels will seal themselves very effectivley if cut or otherwise damaged. You don't loose extra HP after going below 0, and don't bleed appreciably.

field.name: Description
field.text: Makes your skin unusually slick and slightly slimy. It makes it very difficult for something to grab you (-3), and slashing weapons have a tendency to slide off. (0/3/0)

field.name: Description
field.text: Makes your skin tougher and thicker than normal. It cushions impact. (0/0/3)

field.name: Description
field.text: Armored mesh is implanted below the skin. It is located everywhere execpt the face, groin, hands, and feet. Armor is 6/6/5. This is highly visible

field.name: Description
field.text: Armored mesh is implanted below the skin. It is located everywhere execpt the face, groin, hands, and feet. Armor is 2/2/2. This is almost invisible

field.name: Description
field.text: Armored mesh is implanted below the skin. It is located everywhere execpt the face, groin, hands, and feet. Armor is 4/4/4 this is visible if someone looks for it.,

field.name: Description
field.text: A special network of neuro-activated wire actuators suspends your vital organs. If something penetrates your body, they pull your organs out of the way. Take 50piercing damage. Only works if you are not wearing any armor.

field.name: Description
field.text: A tail is added to the body. It is thick and sturdy. It improves your balance, giving +3 to balance-related DEX checks.

field.name: Description
field.text: A tail is added to the body. It has sensation, but has no real use other than cosmetics.

field.name: Description
field.text: A tail is added to the body. It has DEX equal to your normal value. It can be used to hold onto things, etc. Also gives balance dex bonus

field.name: Description
field.text: Enables you to secrete a weak poison from the skin. It is foul tasting, and deals 14-1 damage if ingested. Anything biting you must make a WILL check at -8 or immiedtly let go. (except robots, undead)

field.name: Description
field.text: Addes blades to your wings that can be used as weapons. Use with unarmed combat. 36 damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Adds a set of wings to the body. They can be used to fly up to 20 MPH. Wings can retract inside the body for 2 slots and 6 more CP.

field.name: Description
field.text: Hear a whisper from 100 meters away

field.name: Description
field.text: Increases senses of taste and smell by 4 times.

field.name: Description
field.text: Increase sense of taste by 100 times

field.name: Description
field.text: Additional hole to breath from (can be anywhere on body)

field.name: Description
field.text: Immune to flash and laser blinding

field.name: Description
field.text: Gives + 1 to strike with ranged weapons

field.name: Description
field.text: Detect Hormonal changes, sweat, lie detect (as if at level 4), etc...

field.name: Description
field.text: must have 1 slot for fuel. 14 D, half damage against hard armor

field.name: Description
field.text: Change ears to look like anything you want

field.name: Description
field.text: Change the look of any/all portions of the eye. This can be color of the iris, pupil, or any other portion of the eye. This can also include glowing eyes. Permanent change.

field.name: Description
field.text: Metallic hair, effect is cosmetic only

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can unhinge the jaw, allowing him or her to swallow objects up to 3 times normal size

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can completely change his or her facial features, not including facial hair. This process takes a minute of concentration.

field.name: Description
field.text: A device for stimulating the pleasure or pain centers of the brain directly.

field.name: Description
field.text: Change the look of any/all portions of the eye. This can be color of the iris, pupil, or any other portion of the eye. This can also include glowing eyes. The look of the eyes can be changed at will, takes 15 seconds.

field.name: Description
field.text: 16+1S. Can be used once per round.

field.name: Description
field.text: The eyes can act like flashlights, emiting a beam of light up to 100' away

field.name: Description
field.text: The eyes can project a holographic image of anything the character wishes. The image is unmistakable for a hologram, and will fool only the most stupid into believing what they are seeing. Has no sound.

field.name: Description
field.text: The eyes can emit a bright flash, momentarily stunning those without an anti-dazzle system. Stunned victives are at -3 to all actions for 14 turns

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can completely change his or her facial head hair. This includes style, sparseness, color, and placement

field.name: Description
field.text: Teeth are not natural, and they feel no pain

field.name: Description
field.text: Cosmetic. But if character has the Strengthened Bite implant, then fangs add +3 damage and changes damage to P.

field.name: Description
field.text: 20ft range. Detect exact temperature of surroundings.

field.name: Description
field.text: Regenerates 14+1 HP per round. 1 Slot for power source

field.name: Description
field.text: Acts as a file system for remembering things. It can store up to twenty-five different memories. They can be accessed at will, and the information contained within will never be forgotten.

field.name: Description
field.text: Increase magnification by up to 200 times but for only objects very close to character

field.name: Description
field.text: +1 DEX in applications where speed isn't an issue (Delicate tasks, etc.). If you have a Flexible Skeleton, add +1 DEX all the time and an additional +1 DEX for slow tasks.

field.name: Description
field.text: Can speak multiple things at once

field.name: Description
field.text: Immune to loud noises, and filters out background noise to hear someone in a noisy area

field.name: Description
field.text: 1 Shell in a nostril. Fired from trigger in mouth. Can be any automatic pistol caliber. Cost adds to the cost of the gun you want to use; min STR has -2 for this use.

field.name: Description
field.text: Gives + 4 Brain slots. Only one can be used

field.name: Description
field.text: Allows for electronic output from brain to interface with electronics, computers, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Cosmetic only. Has a 3 Strength, and a Dexterity of the user.

field.name: Description
field.text: Allows the use of a single psionic power (must be purchased normally). Also opens character up to attacks from this type of psionic attack (assuming it's a mental attack)

field.name: Description
field.text: Remove eye from socket, wire connects to face

field.name: Description
field.text: A.I. reconstruction of the human brain. Work identically to a human brain. Contains 8 brain slots which may be utilized for special brain upgrades. Can be located anywhere in the body. Frees up 2 slots in head. The SRB takes up one slot, can be located anywhere.

field.name: Description
field.text: Spit a poison up to 20'. 5 doses

field.name: Description
field.text: At will, the character can kill himself, just by desiring to die

field.name: Description
field.text: Alows hearing of very high frequency sound, like an animal.

field.name: Description
field.text: Can turn on and off at will. When on, it will provide +2 WIS, +2 INT, and +1 action for 14-1 turns. Then, it has the opposite effect for two turns, before it can be activated again.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can speak without opening the mouth.

field.name: Description
field.text: The eyes are replaced by mechanical versions that perform slightly better than their human counterparts. 4x normal vision

field.name: Description
field.text: Deal 24C damage to a target up to 100' away

field.name: Description
field.text: Stun all listeners of the screech for 14 turns. All those stunned lose an action for the duration.

field.name: Description
field.text: Increase vocal range by 4 times. Gives a +4 to the singing skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: Can change characters voice to any recorded voice

field.name: Description
field.text: Increase or decrease volume by up to 10 times.

field.name: Description
field.text: Sees IR and UV Light reflections

field.name: Description
field.text: A special set of feet designed to improve your ability to climb. -1 DEX for normal tasks. +4 to climbing rolls. When combined with Climbing hands, bonus is a total of +6

field.name: Description
field.text: The feet are made unusually durable. They will not develop blisters nor get tired, even when doing heavy work. Stubbing a toe or having your feet stepped on will no longer be as painful and is much less likely to cause injury.

field.name: Description
field.text: The ability to extend your legs up to twice their normal length. You have -3 STR with the legs fully extended. They can be extended and contracted at wll.

field.name: Description
field.text: Retractible metal blades are implanted into the foot. They give +1 damage to kicks and deal S damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: The sole of the foot is toughened with implants. This eliminates the need to wear shoes. You can walk on any normal terrain without hurting your feet. They can also be used to block attacks (if you are sufficiently skilled). The sole has 4/5/3 armor.

field.name: Description
field.text: Small rocket engines implanted into the foot allow you to jump 50further than normal. They can also be used to accelerate the movement of the foot during a kick, adding +5 raw damage. Six uses before recharging.

field.name: Description
field.text: A metal spike is implanted into the heel. It makes it easier to run, walk, etc. on slippery surfaces. It also deals extra damage with kicks or stomps. (+1, P)

field.name: Description
field.text: Gives 3 slots in either leg. (two in thigh and one in calf)

field.name: Description
field.text: Can leap 10+3*X feet vertically or horizontally.

field.name: Description
field.text: A metal spike is implanted into the knee. It can be used to deal 16+1P damage. It also protects the kneecap from injury.

field.name: Description
field.text: Gives 5 additional MPH per purchase. Can be bought 4 times without needing space. Beyond that, every 4 purchases requires a slot.

field.name: Description
field.text: An improved digestive system. It allows you to eat and digest things that would normally have little nutriutional value. This includes stringy vegitation, wood, paper, hard meat, leather, etc. Also extracts more nutrition out of normal foods.

field.name: Description
field.text: Protective armor applied to the crotch area. It elimiates the groin as an effective target in combat. Armor is 5/5/5

field.name: Description
field.text: Allows you to breathe effectivley in bad enviornments, such as smoke, steam, or chemical vapors. It wont create oxygen out of nowhere, but it will filter out mild and some moderate irritants and hazardous substances.

field.name: Description
field.text: Any pistol-caliber can be used. The gun is semiautomatic and is hidden in the groin area. Cost adds to the cost of the gun you pick. STR requirement is normal.

field.name: Description
field.text: The throat can expand to much larger than it's normal size. This allows one to swallow large objects without a problem.

field.name: Description
field.text: Makes the genitals less sensitive to pain, damage, and disease. Improves sexual stamina, and elimiates chafing!

field.name: Description
field.text: Improved kidneys allow you to eat spolied or rotten food that would otherwise make you ill. They remove toxins from the blood very effectivley.

field.name: Description
field.text: Improves your ability to breathe under duress. You don't have to gasp or breathe hard when doing strenuous activity. Gives a +3 to BLD checks for strenuous activity.

field.name: Description
field.text: A complex modification that enables things to be moved throughout the body. It can be used to remove embedded objects (splinters, bullets, etc.) this can be used with an internal storage compartment. Example: swallow a key and have it appear in the compartment.

field.name: Description
field.text: Allows one to control one's metabolism. This can be used to maintain a certain weight and to govern sleep cycles, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: A small implant stores hyper-concentrated vitamins an minerals from when your body has a surplus and saves them for later, when needed. This allows the body to be healthy when eating poor food for extended periods of time.

field.name: Description
field.text: Enables the user to elimiate his or her natural scent. It also effects burps and flatulence, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: A small tank implanted in the body is used to store compressed 3 hours worth of oxygen. It can be used to breathe anywhere. If the tank is destroyed, when full, it explodes and deals 66+3 damage to the host.

field.name: Description
field.text: Adds significant dexterity to the genitals. This is used to enhance sexual pleasure.

field.name: Description
field.text: Duplciates the effect of a vital organ (pick one). If the original is damaged, this takes over, saving your life.

field.name: Description
field.text: Normally used for males only. The genitals can be pulled up into the body to protect them from harm. Can also be used for disguise purposes.

field.name: Description
field.text: A modification to the lungs that enables them to seal themselves if punctured. If your lungs are wounded, you suffer no special effects.

field.name: Description
field.text: Enables the user to self-destruct his body and cause serious damage in the process. Deals 5x 66+3 to a 20' radius. Kills the character.

field.name: Description
field.text: enables the user to change his sexual appearance. The changetakes less than a minuite, and can make a man look like a woman, or vice versa, even when totally naked. It does NOT actually change the user's sex, just the appearance.

field.name: Description
field.text: Makes the body quiet. It cancels the sound of the heartbeat, breathing, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: A compartment is installed in the body. It can be accessed by opening a door on the body. It can store something a little bigger than a soda can.

field.name: Description
field.text: Makes the body appear room temperature.

field.name: Description
field.text: takes a slot. The tank can be filled with anything you can swallow. At a later time, you can spew the contents of the tank forth, out your mouth.

field.name: Description
field.text: An upgrade to the digestive tract finds a way to use ALL the substances you ingest. It all but eliminates the need to excrete waste.

field.name: Description
field.text: Enables the recipient to control his or her weight. By thinking about it, the user can add or remove fat quite quickly. Up to one pound per minuite. When gaining weight, the user must ingest something for the weight to come from (e.g. food)

field.name: Description
field.text: A special type of arrowhead designed to penetrate heavy armor. They are expensive and time-consuming to produce, and therefore generally rare for military use (at least by common soldiers). The forged and hardened point is square or triangular in profile, carefully ground into a very sharp point.

field.name: Description
field.text: Common for hunting small game (especially birds), and also used for war. This is a standard arrow (bullet point) with several metallic barbs embedded in the head. It is difficult to remove, causing additional damage when it is pulled out of the target.

field.name: Description
field.text: These are the most effective hunting arrows. They aren't great at penetrating heavy armor, but are excellent for causing additional damage to the target. This is particularly desirable for hunting, because it is likely to kill or incapacitate the target animal quickly, even if the vital organs are missed. A broadhead is a wide, diamond-shaped head that has two or more fins on it that are sharpened into bladeswhich cut a devastating wound in the target.

field.name: Description
field.text: The standard type of arrow point. The tip is pointed, but somewhat blunt, like a rifle bullet. They are used for hunting small game, and for target shooting. They are also common arrows for some military use since they are easily and cheaply produced.

field.name: Description
field.text: A common military arrowhead. This is also the most common type of dart. The head is made of steel, and fashioned into a narrow conemuch like a pencil. These types of arrows are generally not used for hunting, but are very effective for wartime use.

field.name: Description
field.text: A rare arrow design, which features a hollow head packed with gunpowder or other light explosive. When it strikes the target, it makes a small explosion. This has excellent damage potential. Unfortunately, the large, fragile, head makes this type of arrow poor at penetrating armor.

field.name: Description
field.text: 5AP, has fire effect, light before shooting.

field.name: Description
field.text: An arrow that is coated with cloth soaked in pitch, tar, kerosene, or some similar flammable material. It is set alight before firing. These arrows are commonly used for sending signals, and for setting enemy structures on firehowever, they are also effective for setting enemy soldiers on fire.

datum.name: 25 mm S H Fist of God

field.name: Capacity
field.text: 3, all fire at once (3 rnd burst)

field.name: Description
field.text: ALCAR plate is heavy armor developed for use in military and SWAT applications. It consists of a helmet, long-sleeved jacket and pants. The suit is made of heavy ballistic nylon which is covered with form-fitting ALuminum-CARbon plates which cover the vast majority of the body.

field.name: Description
field.text: Articulated plate represents the finest acheivement of the blacksmith-armorer. It consists of a full suit of form-fitting and overlapping metal plates that cover the entire body from head to toe. The superior joints in articulated plate provide much better mobility than standard full plate. Articulated plate must be made specifically for a given wearer.

field.name: Description
field.text: This armor was developed for strategic depolyment by special forces soldiers and elite personal security details. It offers superior protection to armors of similar weight. This armor consists of a Spectra sleeved vest and matching pants. The entire suit is covered with polymeric plates reenforced with boron nanotubes. The thickness and shape of the plates is optimized to provide good mobility and protection.

field.name: Description
field.text: Heavy bulletproof vest with a trauma plate in the chest area.

field.name: Description
field.text: A very light bulletproof vest. This is typically used by undercover police or anyone that needs unobtrusive protection.

field.name: Description
field.text: A typical Kevlar bulletproof vest. Very commonly issued to soldiers and police.

field.name: Description
field.text: A leather suit covered in overlapping and layerd metal plates that curve around the body.

field.name: Description
field.text: Leather armor made from special leather from wilderness beasts. Scarce.

field.name: Description
field.text: Leather suit worn by motorcycle racers. The suit is specially tailored to fit the rider while in the ridng position. This, size is considered to be zero when the rider is on a motorcycle.

field.name: Description
field.text: This high-tech armor is typically marketed to private security and mercenaries as it is generally too heavy for use by typical police or military forces. It consists of incredibly tough dual-phase plate armor over a spectra inner suit. This armor is exceptionally resistant to battle damage and is capable of absorbing a remarkable amount of damage before becoming unusuable.

field.name: Description
field.text: Brigandine armor is made from a heavy cloth or supple leather tunic that is fitted with a regular pattern of rectangular iron plates. It covers the body from the neck to the thighs, and also covers the shoulder area.

field.name: Description
field.text: CLAF armor is the trade name for Cross-Linked Aramid Fiber. This armor is a technologically superior bulletproof vest which covers the chest, torso, and groin area. CLAF armor is common amongst police in affluent precincts and is also issued to some frontline infantry troops.

field.name: Description
field.text: CLB-WAF, called Clubwaf by its wearers, is the most effective bulletproof vestdeveloped. It consists of a Spectra-boron nanocomposite thread that is woven into armored cloth. This armor delivers remarkable protection but is light enough to be used by beat cops and common soldiers.

field.name: Description
field.text: This is the modern equivalent of plate mail armor. Unlike it's historical equivalent, this armor is made of lightweight composites. It also incorporates flexible joints which means that it is nearly universal in fitment. It consists of high saturation 3D carbon fiber matix plates impregnated with semimetallic resins. This armor is typically used by SWAT and Military units.

field.name: Description
field.text: Ceramic Plate armor was developed as an outgrowth of vehicle armor research. Ceramic Plate consists of large, scuplted plates that closely fit the body. The joints are unarmored. Though it is an uncommon choice for military or police use, it is very popular amonst freelance mercenaries and adventurers due to its excellent fire resistance.

field.name: Description
field.text: Chain mail consists of an armored vest (Hauberk) and pants. The armor is a very flexible fabric that is made of thousands of interlocking metal rings. Typically this is worn over padded armor as the rings are known for chafing against bare skin.

field.name: Description
field.text: A chain mail suit covered with thick metal plates

field.name: Description
field.text: Heavy clothing designed especially for protectionlike a woodsman's coveralls, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Heavy hard armor carrying collapsed abotex plates. Exceedingly rare.

field.name: Description
field.text: Similar to chain mail, but a superior design with a higher denisty of rings.

field.name: Description
field.text: A superior form of chain mail made from exceptionally small metal rings that are interlinked in three dimensions.

field.name: Description
field.text: A fine suit of plate armor. It is made of exotic metals and has finely fitted joints to improve mobility.

field.name: Description
field.text: Hard armor composed of fiberglass-epoxy plates over a kevlar interior

field.name: Description
field.text: A chain mail suit covered with thick, form-fitting heavy metal plates

field.name: Description
field.text: A heavy synth coat covered with hundreds of small hexagonal CERMET plates

field.name: Description
field.text: A heavy denim coat covered with hundreds of small hexagonal metal tiles

field.name: Description
field.text: A thick, bulky vest that is padded and contains iron plates that cover vital areas of the chest and groin. (Millitary style, WWII, etc.)

field.name: Description
field.text: Metallurgically improved plate armor. It is the same encumberance but provides better protection.

field.name: Description
field.text: A full chain mail suit completely covered with form fitting heavy steel plates

field.name: Description
field.text: cold weather clothing made from leather and animal furs

field.name: Description
field.text: Highly advanced semimetallic armor oriented on the molecular level

field.name: Description
field.text: A snazzy, gray, woolen, formal vest. It is somewhat bulky, but very debonair. Adds +1 to all Build-related skills. A magical item.

field.name: Description
field.text: Heavy hard armor made from hard-cast semimetallic composite plates

field.name: Description
field.text: A chain mail suit sparcely covered with thick, non-interlocking plates

field.name: Description
field.text: Similar to soft leather, except that the main pieces are made of hard tooled leather

field.name: Description
field.text: Any sort of unusually thick clothinglike a parka, leather jacket, heavy denim, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: A suit of fully enclosed metal plate armor. The plates are thicker than normal for superior protection.

field.name: Description
field.text: A cloak made of heavy cloth secured with leather straps. The surface is covered with small stones and bits of metal bonded and sewn in place.

field.name: Description
field.text: armored clothing made from pure kevlar with normal cloth over it. Designed to be inconspicuous. (used by diplomats, etc.)

field.name: Description
field.text: Armor made from weaving steel wire into cloth

field.name: Description
field.text: A partial plate suit. It consists of a breast plate, shoulder plates and greaves. The plates are cut to maximize movement.

field.name: Description
field.text: secondary armor for millitary applicationsa network of metal plates over a cloth vest

field.name: Description
field.text: Thin armor material that is nearly impossible to cut

field.name: Description
field.text: Tough clothing made from NOMEX fibersdesigned for fire protection. Worn by firefighters and emergency workers

field.name: Description
field.text: Millitary armor made from tough armored fibers and composite plastics

field.name: Description
field.text: Same as the above, with additional polymeric plates in key areas. This is the heaviest armor used by ultramodern SWAT forces.

field.name: Description
field.text: Heavy clothing lined with multiple layers of thick fur, padding, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Light hard armor made from advanced polymeric plates over a kevlar suit

field.name: Description
field.text: Polymeric hard armor containing steel inserts in all plates

field.name: Description
field.text: Rubber-impregnated polyester fabric filled with dogbone-shaped interlocking metal bars. Protects against chemicals too.

field.name: Description
field.text: Full body jumpsuit made of fireproof materials. Designed to save the life of race car drivers, pilots, etc, in the event of a crash or fire.

field.name: Description
field.text: Very hard and stiff leather with inlaid metal reinforcements. The edges are ringed in metal.

field.name: Description
field.text: Large metal rings held together with leather straps

field.name: Description
field.text: Standard SWAT armor: Ballistics cloth with metal plates in key locations

field.name: Description
field.text: Boron-composite plates over a spectra undersuit. Rare, generally used by special forces or elite units.

field.name: Description
field.text: Improved version of Kevar, very flexible yet stands up well to piercing and slashing

field.name: Description
field.text: A heavy bulletproof vest made from the improved SPECTRA material with a steel chestplate

field.name: Description
field.text: Hard leather armor covered in overlapping metal scales

field.name: Description
field.text: A chain mail suit with additional metal scales covering the chain material

field.name: Description
field.text: Armored robes made from woven silk threads.

field.name: Description
field.text: Armored clothing made of pieces of thick, soft, leather sewn together

field.name: Description
field.text: A shock-damping suit made from a special rubber material

field.name: Description
field.text: Soft leather armor covered with paralell vertical bands of iron

field.name: Description
field.text: A modern version of full plate mail

field.name: Description
field.text: Soft leather underlayment with multiple layers of hard leather straps held on by metallic buckles or rings. Creaks and makes noise when moving.

field.name: Description
field.text: Armor made of hundreds of toad-skins stitched together. This may be worn either inside or outside of armor as it is quite suppled and billowing. The armor provides protection against poisons and acids, as long as it is not punctured. Even though the armor is considered Hard it does not count as Hard for sizing and encumbrance purposes.

field.name: Description
field.text: Special leather made from the hide of rare and dangerous monsters is used to make this superior type of armor.

field.name: Description
field.text: The tool of a professional woodsman. The double-headed axe offers more weight and a backup cutting edge to help power through wood chopping chores. It also proved more effective on the battlefield than standard axes.

field.name: Description
field.text: A typical axea tool for chopping and spitting wood. Many conscripted soldiers found their farm axes to be devastating in combat, often proving more effective than some swords.

field.name: Description
field.text: The strongest Nordic warriors often wielded huge, oversized, versions of the their typical war axe. Equipped with a double-edge head and a design that concentrates most of the blade weight towards the end of the weapon, the Berzerker axe is unequaled for damage potential. However, its massive size limits its use to the strongest heroes.

field.name: Description
field.text: A tough, heavier, superior version of a normal axe designed for enabling rescue crews to quickly enter buildings. The fireman's axe has a spike on the back of the axe-head, enabling it to be used as a piercing weapon as well.

field.name: Description
field.text: A small axe used for breaking up firewood and light-duty farmwork. Though not intended as a tool of war, hatchets served many a warrior as a backup weapon.

field.name: Description
field.text: Some of the strongest medieval knights depended on heavy battle axes to deliver maximum damage to their enemies, human or otherwise. The heavy battle axe is designed for the roughest combat conditions, equipped with a massive, broad, headand the weight to carry it through it's target.

field.name: Description
field.text: An adaptation of a wood-chopping tool to an implement of war. Light enough to be carried by most soldiers, yet capable of dealing high amounts of damage, light battle axes were favored weapons of many medieval armies.

field.name: Description
field.text: An oversized battle-axe subscribing to the idea that more weight equals more damageand rightly so. The Lochaber axe's massive blade deals huge damage, and the spiked backside can deal a very nasty piercing attack.

field.name: Description
field.text: Developed by the fiercest Norse barbarian tribes, this is a simple yet fearsome weapon. Forged from the superior steels of the northern countries, the huge swept blade would easily cleave armor and limbs alike, and the carved handle provided for a very controllable swing. Many Norse warriors named their war-axes such things as widowmaker or swordbreaker.

field.name: Description
field.text: A common tool for mining, digging, and general construction applications. The pickaxe is a heavy tool with a large, pointed, head. It is effective for breaking up rocks during mining, and breaking up armor in combat.

field.name: Description
field.text: A simple yet effective weapon, consisting of a wooden handle capped with a round iron or bronze head.

field.name: Description
field.text: A simple piece of wood or metal used to beat your opponent into submission. Think baseball.

field.name: Description
field.text: A wooden club, traditionally made from a gnarled tree branch or root.

field.name: Description
field.text: A normal household hammer. You never know when you might need to use one as a backup weapon.

field.name: Description
field.text: +3 to parry, no penalty to parry heavy weapons

field.name: Description
field.text: A common European weapon. The mace proved an effective weapon against opponents wearing chain mail or other soft armor. It is basically a club with a metal facing, often studded.

field.name: Description
field.text: A tool for splitting logs, often adapted for combat purposes to split skulls. The maul is a wedge-shaped iron head mounted to a long handle.

field.name: Description
field.text: A large hammer, typically used for construction workand sometimes conscripted as a weapon. A sledgehammer has an iron head weighing several pounds mounted atop a long wooden handle.

field.name: Description
field.text: A very easy-to-make weapon consisting of a cord with a weight on the end. A slungshot is used much like a yo-yo. It is not a chained weapon because of it's use: straight-line shots. The range of the weapon can be up to 10 feet. Specialists may use a variant called a loaded sleeve which is a modification of long robe-sleeves to use the weapon. As an Exotic weapon, the slungshot may be used twice in a single action.

field.name: Description
field.text: A common sidearm of police and security personnel throughout the ages. It consists of a metal or wooden bar, about 18 long, equipped with a handle mounted at 90 degrees to the bar, one third of the way down. It is quick to swing, and can deal crushing blows. As well, it is effective at blocking enemy attacks.

field.name: Description
field.text: Heavy metal brass knuckles, shaped like a D; made by Rock Trolls. Can be used as Blunt or Body (punch). Can cast any of the following spells, but only one of the spells per day

field.name: Description
field.text: A piece of metal designed to fit inside a closed fist. It usually has spikes that protrude between the fingers, or rings that surround the fingersallowing one to deal more damage with punches.

field.name: Description
field.text: Similar to brass knuckles. This is a leather or fabric strap covered with metal studs that is wrapped around the fighter's hands and wrists.

field.name: Description
field.text: These gloves were owned by Julius Creese of the Church of St. Simon. Similar gloves have been used by important members of the church in times past, though their mothod of manufacture has been lost. A pair of whilte cloth gloves. The gloves are heavily starched and have a bright white color despite their age and lack of care. EAch glove has a large cuff that surrounds the wrist ofthe wearer. The left glove has black text reading Speak With The Deadsuperimposed over a cross imprinted onto the back of the hand. The right glove has text reading Saint Simon is in Heaven Now. These gloves have the following properties, which only work if both glvoes are worn

field.name: Description
field.text: These are leather gloves which have lead or steel shot sewn into the back of the fingers and hand. This protects the wearer's hands in a fight, and the extra weight deals extra damage. They are commonly used by bouncers, security personnel, and police forces.

field.name: Description
field.text: Fairly self-explanatory. These are heavy-duty boots with metal studs or spikes embedded in the toe areaperfect for delivering a thorough ass kicking.

field.name: Description
field.text: An iron ball, often spiked, attached by a length of chain to a handle.

field.name: Description
field.text: A fairly long chain equipped with weights on either endvery effective for striking an opponent, and then entangling him.

field.name: Description
field.text: A length of iron chain suitable for striking an opponent with.

field.name: Description
field.text: A length of chain that is periodically set with spikes or blades. A fairly unusual weapon, but one that is capable of causing serious damage in skilled hands.

field.name: Description
field.text: Originally a grain-threshing tool. A flail consists of a stout handle capped with a hinged (or shortly chained) iron head, often studded.

field.name: Description
field.text: A common weapon of martial artists. Usually carried in pairs, nunchaku consist of two wooden or iron bars linked with a short chain. Though compact, they can deal devastating crushing blows.

field.name: Description
field.text: A variant of the flail designed for harsh combat. The war flail has a thick handle, and is equipped with three or more spiked iron balls on chains. It is a heavy and unwieldy weapon, but is very powerful.

field.name: Description
field.text: The Atalatl is a device that is used to throw spears with greater power than a typical throw. It is used with short spears.

field.name: Description
field.text: The Cicada Wing Blade is a Chinese weapon that is held like a staff. It has a central handle, two large blades at either end, and two smaller blades that protrude from the blade-handle junctions. +1 to parry. Counts as double weapon

field.name: Description
field.text: Literally Hammer of Iron, this is the largest of the hammer type weapons. It's fifty-pound iron head requires a true brute to swing, but woe to those who would be in its path.

field.name: Description
field.text: The largest of the Japanese swords. No-Dachi have blades that exceed 40 in length. The entire sword is considerably longer. They are strongly curved, and were worn slung across the back. Though they require significant space to swing, there is no more powerful sword in the world. A warrior with such a weapon would have no problem cleaving a man in half.

field.name: Description
field.text: A farming implement that is fairly effective for combat use; typically used in pairs. Sai are slender metal rods with large handguards. They can deal strong blows in combat, and are very effective for deflecting and intercepting enemy attacks.

field.name: Description
field.text: An ingenious sword with a C-shaped curved blade. It is very effective at reaching behind an enemy's shield. A skilled fighter with this weapon will succeed in striking his target very frequently.

field.name: Description
field.text: A variant of the standard Tanto. This knife has a triangular profile and very thick, narrow blade. It is designed to pierce heavy armor, but is also a great slashing weapon. It takes an unusually skilled smith to forge this kind of Tanto, thus it is a rare and expensive knife.

field.name: Description
field.text: The Japanese equivalent of the Long bow. It is of composite design and is very large. The Yumi is unusual because the grip is located two-thirds of the way down the bow, rather than in the center, and it is fired with the bow leaning forward. This means that it requires a very high ceiling to fire a Yumi indoors. The design of this bow makes it extremely powerfuleasily capable of defeating heavily armored opponents. Unfortunatley, it is very large and therefore it can be difficult to transport.

field.name: Description
field.text: An Indian weapon, somewhat of a cross between a hammer, axe, and a pick. It appears much like a normal axe, but is equipped with a slender triangular-shaped head that offers it great flexibility as a weapon.

field.name: Description
field.text: A butcher's cleaver, or combat variation thereof. It is a large, heavy, blade with a razor sharp edge. It has a short reach, but is devastatingly effective for chopping-type attacks. It is useless for stabbing.

field.name: Description
field.text: A combat knife, typically with a slender blade and a hand guard. A standard backup weapon for most soldiers.

field.name: Description
field.text: Also called a Quatar or punch dagger. It consists of a handle mounted perpendicular to the blade, often in a Tshape. The handle is gripped in a closed fist, with a triangular blade extending forward. It is used in a punching motion.

field.name: Description
field.text: A Southeast Asian knife, as carried by the Gurkha regiments of India. This is a large weapon, nearly the size of a machete. The blade has a strong downward angle. It is nearly useless for stabbing, but is a very effective weapon and chopping tool. A well made kukri is just as effective as a small axe for chopping.

field.name: Description
field.text: A special variety of fighting knife. The slender blade is longer than 8, and sharpened along both edges. This is among the largest weapons in this categoryand is effective for both stabbing and slashing.

field.name: Description
field.text: A knife with a scalloped or otherwise serrated edge. The serrations are very effective for damaging flesh, but reduce the knife's effectiveness at penetrating hard materials.

field.name: Description
field.text: This would be a typical pocketknife, Swiss army knife, or any knife with a short blade. Not very effective as a weapon, but easy to concealand a decent backup.

field.name: Description
field.text: Not so much a knife, but a slender metal spike with a handle. It cannot cut things, but is an excellent stabbing weapon, easily penetrating many types of armor. It does not deal much damage, so it is frequently used with poisons, or with called shots to vital organs.

field.name: Description
field.text: A Japanese knife forged in the traditional style. The blade is formed from multiple layers of different steels. Tanto are unusually well balanced, and are exceptionally effective slashing weapons. It has a very small hand guard.

field.name: Description
field.text: This is the typical sword of the medieval knight. It is designed to be wielded with one or two hands, and can be used my most people.

field.name: Description
field.text: Another common European sword. This weapon has a fairly short, wide, blade.

field.name: Description
field.text: A famous weapon of Scottish origin. This blade requires a very strong person to wieldeven two handed, but deals impressive damage to match. Claymores generally have a blade 5..6 feet long. The long reach of the claymore makes it effective for engaging multiple targets at once.

field.name: Description
field.text: A slender Spanish sword, rather like a large saber. Many of the world's greatest swordsmen relied upon this weapon to quell their foes.

field.name: Description
field.text: A fearsome sword with scalloped, flame-like, blade edges. Sure to inspire terror in your enemies, before you cut them down where they stand.

field.name: Description
field.text: A weapon with exceptional deadliness and grace. The five-foot blade requires a very strong warrior to wield, but reciprocates with exceptional damage potential.

field.name: Description
field.text: The largest traditional sword. The grand sword appears much like a great sword, only larger. It is sufficiently heavy that only a mighty warrior might wield it, but is nearly indestructibleand is only matched by the No-Dachi in combat effectiveness.

field.name: Description
field.text: A huge version of the typical medieval sword. This is a massive weapon, with a blade several feet long, and a thickness and width to match. Few foes are a match for a warrior who can wield this massive weapon.

field.name: Description
field.text: The typical weapon of the Samurai warrior. The Katana is a long sword worn alongside a Wakizashi. The blade is generally around 24..30 inches in length, and is shaped to be a natural extension of the warrior's arm. Like the Wakizashi, the superior edge of this weapon makes it fearsome in combat. A true Katana wielded by a skilled warrior can cut through a steel pipe or a large wooden post.

field.name: Description
field.text: A favored weapon of medieval heroes. The long sword is a slender weapon with deadly reach.

field.name: Description
field.text: Not so much a sword as a sword-shaped club. A massive piece of steel weighing in excess of forty pounds, few foes can withstand a blow from this weapon.

field.name: Description
field.text: Target must win STR contest to block or parry

field.name: Description
field.text: A more ancient Japanese sword. The Tachi is longer than a Katana, with a blade of around 34 or more inches long. Worn much like a European sword, this weapon offers exceptional power to a warrior who can wield it. It's is nearly impossible to use indoors due to it's length.

field.name: Description
field.text: The Tai Chi sword is an Asian weapon whose goal is grace and accuracy rather than raw mass and power. The weapon has a narrow, double-edged blade and is equipped with a strung counterweight on the pommel

field.name: Description
field.text: A steel rod with a plasma blade at one end; damage listed for either end.

field.name: Description
field.text: Your average knife. This would be a knife with a fairly large blade. Most sheath knives, kitchen knives, or hunting knives would fall into this category.

field.name: Description
field.text: A standard European-style cut and thrustsword. It was the mainstay weapon of the footsoldiers of many past armiesa durable weapon that can be counted on in combat.

field.name: Description
field.text: This is one of the simplest yet most effective polearms. An awl pike is a long, slender, metal spike affixed to the end of a long wooden pole. It is a highly effective stabbing weapon.

field.name: Description
field.text: A long wooden pole topped with an iron head. One side of the head features an axe blade; the other is equipped with a spike for piercing armor. Originally used as a tool for shipsthe axe head was used to chop stuck mooring lines; the spike could be used to snag ropes or wreckage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Where most polearms consist of a smallish blade with a long handle, the Bicento is a long blade with a long handle. The blade and handle would both measure somewhere around 4 feet in length.

field.name: Description
field.text: A lengthy handle topped with a hook-like metal blade. It can deliver fierce attacks, and can also be used to pull riders off their mounts.

field.name: Description
field.text: A simple, effective, weaponespecially for defensive positions. A halberd is basically a large knife blade mounted on a pole for extra reach.

field.name: Description
field.text: A vicious Japanese polearm equipped with a cross-like blade. Though not exceptionally damaging in and out of itself, it is unmatched when wielded by a powerful warrior.

field.name: Description
field.text: A long, reinforced wooden pole equipped with an iron point and handguard. It is generally used while riding on a charging horse. The faster you move, the more damage you can deal.

field.name: Description
field.text: A larger spear used for hunting large animals, or for war. Generally around eight feet long.

field.name: Description
field.text: Similar to a Beaked Axe. The head on a Lucerne hammer has one spiked face, and one crushing face.

field.name: Description
field.text: A variant on a simple pike. The military fork is a group of thin metal tines (spikes) mounted to a long handle. It is much more effective for parrying than a pike, since one can catch weapons between its tines. It is also effective for huntingit is excellent for spearing small animals or fish.

field.name: Description
field.text: A Japanese halberd. The Naginata blade is actually much longer than its cutting edge, with the bulk of its length embedded in the handle. The superior blade and this unique construction make it a very deadly and well-balanced weapon.

field.name: Description
field.text: A very long sharp stick. Pikes are generally much longer than other polearmsoften twenty feet long. The point is generally made from iron, but simple pikes might just have carved points.

field.name: Description
field.text: Similar to a normal halberd, but equipped with a long, slender, blade.

field.name: Description
field.text: This is cross-listed in the spears section. This would be a common hunting spear.

field.name: Description
field.text: Originally a fisherman's tool, and a favored weapon of the gladiatorial area. A trident is a spear with three points, increasing the chances of striking a target.

field.name: Description
